title: Music 2000
description:
Easy to use music generator from Codemasters. Not new, but classic and still kinda cool. Didn't find a torrent for PC version from anywhere so I decided to rip and share one by myself.

The software is direct CD-ROM clone. You can either burn it on the CD or just mount the .iso image with Daemon Tools, PowerISO, Alcohol or similar...

Not guaranteed to work on Vista as I have no chance to test it on Vista, but works just great in my PC which have Win XP Pro (32bit) + SP3.

Should run nicely on oldtimer PC's too as minimum requirements are :

* 233Mhz MMX CPU
* 16Mb RAM
* 16bit Soundblaster or compatible soundcard
* DirectX 7 compatible video card (4Mb 3D card needed for creating videos)
* 4X CD-ROM drive
* 265Mb HDD Space
